dict.acceptation: 向后的；倒行的；返回的；落后的；

sent.orig: Backwards, he thought. Full speed ahead backwards.
sent.trans: 一切都落后了，他想，欲速则不达了。

sent.orig: Wait a minute! I read the tag backwards. It'says D-O-G. Dog?
sent.trans: 等一下！我把牌子看反了。上面写的是狗。狗？

sent.orig: Continue, list all of your work experience job by job progressing backwards in time.
sent.trans: 继续列出你所有的工作经验，从你最近的工作开始往前写。

sent.orig: She used a dog to prevent the wheel from moving backwards.
sent.trans: 她用了一个挡块防止车轮倒退。

sent.orig: Severe system damage may occur if the sleeve is installed backwards.
sent.trans: 如果套管安装朝向相反，可能会导致严重的系统损害。
